Literature.Title: Bioactivity and Bactericidal Mechanism of Histidine-Rich ?-Hairpin Peptide Against Gram-Negative Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Dong N, Wang C, Zhang T, Zhang L, Xue C, Feng X, Bi C, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=>128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:40% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=16µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(50-60% Killing=128µM)
